Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: esra7
Reviews.Content: Although this camera looks a little big and old fashioned from the outside, it takes amazing photos. I loved using it and had it for about 3 years. I especially loved how the photos came out without flash. My only complaint is that it just stopped working recently out of nowhere, however i liked this camera so much that i plan on buying the same camera if i can find a good deal. Recommended!

Reviews.Title: Ehhhhh
Reviews.Author: afc72196
Reviews.Content: Okay, so I've had this camera for about 3 years now, and it doesn't take the best pictures.  If you are taking a picture of something up close it's fine, but the zoom is terrible. Also, they are selling it on amazon for $175??????? THAT'S CRAZY. DO NOT EVER SPEND THAT ON THIS CAMERA. YOU CAN GET MUCH BETTER. This only has 3x optical zoom. Not very good. I'm buying myself the Panasonic Lumix ZS8 right now. I am VERY excited! If your giving this to a 12 year old it's good, cause that's when I got it.

ProductInfo.Features:
1/2.5" CCD; 9.2 megapixels
3x optical, 5x digital zooms
2.4" LCD
ProductInfo.Name: KODAK EasyShare CD93 9.2MP Digital Camera- Blue
